title: Gemstone Total Never Updated
body: A week or two ago, I got 3 key shards used those to open one of my boxes.  That box contained a skin shard and a gemstone, so my count should go from 1 to 2.  I rerolled 3 of my 4 skin shards into a random permanent (Curling Veigar) and my gemstone disappeared.  Still only have 1.  Anyway to verify this?

replies.body: I took a look into this for you and see that you do still have a Gemstone!  When you get a chance, relog and let me know if it's still missing!
